fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At day, choose a player to grant the wish of. (3 Uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At night you and your target will get a private whisper channel to discuss their wish.
- The wish can be almost anything (such as killing a certain player or giving yourself invincible defence) but the host can deny any wishes they deem too unbalanced.
- Wishes cannot revive the dead.
- Wishes cannot give or provide more wishes in any way.
- Wishes cannot target certain roles or factions, only players.
- Once accepted by the Host, the wish must be cast exactly how it's worded.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Grant 3 wishes OR twist a players wish to backfire/do nothing.
